dcterms:creator: P. Bilic
P. Christ
H. Li
E. Vorontsov
A. Ben-Cohen
G. Kaissis
B. Menze
dcterms:description: The LiTS dataset consists of 131 abdominal CT scans in the training set and 70 test volumes, including segmentations of the liver and liver tumors, acquired from 7 different institutions with a diverse set of liver tumor diseases.
dcterms:title: LiTS dataset

dcterms:creator: M. E. Tschuchnig
J. Coste-Marin
P. Steininger
M. Gadermayr
dcterms:description: The CBCT Liver and Liver Tumor Segmentation Train Data is used for multi-task learning to improve semantic segmentation of CBCT scans through image reconstruction.
dcterms:title: CBCT Liver and Liver Tumor Segmentation Train Data

dcterms:description: Synthetic CBCT Data is a synthetically generated dataset used in the study to simulate intraoperative CBCT volumes for liver and liver tumor segmentation.
dcterms:title: Synthetic CBCT Data
